name: ReactrMedia
overview:
LittleAlien Media owns and manages websites, blogs, and other online brands. Through our properties, we develop unique and creative content as well as provide innovative services.

Their largest property is the blog of Stephen Perkins, LittleAlien Founder. Stephen blogs about entrepreneurship, self development, and also writes the occasional OP/ED piece.

The latest bog that LittleAlien has been developing is 30 Day Blog. Although development is taking a short hiatus, the goal of 30 Day Blog is to teach people new to the field of blogging how they can start their own blog in one month.

LittleAlien Media has also recently launched a web hosting company, HTX Hosting. HTX was founded out of a need for a quality small business web hosting company that understand small business needs.

LittleAlien is looking towards the future. There are plans for three department to be added in the next 2 years: Radio, Online TV, and a Fil Division.
